title: Thy selected people spare; Arm our caution'd souls with patience, Fill our humbled hearts with prayer
verses:
Every fresh alarming token
More confirm the faithful word;
Nature, by thy Lord hath spoken,
Shows thy tabernacle near;
From this national confusion,
From this ruined earth and skies,
See the times of restitution,
See the new creation rise!

Vanish, then, this world of shadows!
Pass the former things away;
Lord, appear! appear to glad us
With the dawn of endless day!
O conclude this mortal story!
Throw this universe aside!
Come, eternal King of glory,
Now descend and take thy bride!

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Focuses on God's mercy during judgment, the promised restitution of all things, and the longing for Christ's return to establish His eternal kingdom
